import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useParams, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { Container, Row, Col, Button, Card, Form } from "react-bootstrap"; import Navbar from "../components/Navbar"; function ProductDetail() { const { id } = useParams(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const [book, setBook] = useState(null); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [feedbacks, setFeedbacks] = useState([]); const [rate, setRate] = useState(5); const [comment, setComment] = useState(""); const [name, setName] = useState(""); if (loading) { return (

Loading book details...

); } return ( <>

{book.title}

{book.author}

{book.rating && (
{"★".repeat(Math.round(book.rating))} {"☆".repeat(5 - Math.round(book.rating))} {book.rating} / 5 ({book.reviews} reviews)
)}
{book.originalPrice && (
{book.originalPrice.toLocaleString()} VND {book.discount && ( -{book.discount}% )}
)}

{book.price?.toLocaleString()} VND

{book.description}

Feedback

{feedbacks.length === 0 ? (

No feedback yet.

) : ( feedbacks.map((fb) => (
{fb.userName || "User"}{" "} {new Date(fb.createdAt).toLocaleString()}
{"★".repeat(Math.round(fb.rate || 0))} {"☆".repeat(5 - Math.round(fb.rate || 0))}
{fb.comment}
 )) )}
Add your feedback
Name (optional) setName(e.target.value)} /> Rate setRate(e.target.value)}> Comment setComment(e.target.value)} required />

); } export default ProductDetail;
